title: Osho_Vigyan Bhairav Tantra Vol 2_audio_Eng
description:
Vigyan Bhairav Tantra, Vol2
This 5000 year old ancient Indian text on meditation is considered by many as the last word on meditation.
It contains 112 techniques of Meditation. Basically in the form of a dialogue between lord Shiva and his wife Parvati (refer to as Devi in the book), this books discusses 112  meditation techniques which can be used for realizing our true self.

Osho talks given from 01/10/72 pm to 01/03/73 pm, Bombay, India
English Discourse series

The original series of 80 Osho discourses were simply
called â€Vigyan Bhairav Tantraâ€.
For publication as books they were divided up into 5 volumes,
called the â€The Book of the Secrets Volume 1 - 5â€ (16 discourses each).
 
During the discourse, Osho also gave answer to various queries from the listeners.



Audio quality is good, 24Kbps, 22KHz
